citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks, University of Alaska Museum, Herbarium, Northern Plant Documentation Center
citeinfo.title: Alaska Plant Collection

descript.abstract: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils; Database of plant specimen label data from the Herbarium of the University of Alaska Museum. Most records include latitude longitude coordinates. Database is used primarily to produce range maps and checklists. Botanical database designed to store data on nomenclature and specimens. This database supports the Alaska vascular and nonvascular plant collection at the University of Alaska Herbarium. Contains the following related files, NAMES, INFGENERA, GENERA, FAMILIES, RCODE, AUTHORS, LOCALITIES, SPECIMENS, COLLECTORS, LITERATURE, EXSICCATAE, VOUCHERREF, PARAMS.

idinfo.accconst: Responses to routine inquires about the plant data are provided free of charge through the herbarium curator.
idinfo.useconst: Credit must be given to the source of data.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metac: Responses to routine inquires about the plant data are provided free of charge through the herbarium curator.
